# https://rs.com.sa


## Posts

- [Deep cleaning](https://rs.com.sa/deep-cleaning/): Deep Cleaning with FurnitureA professional service for all rooms in your home or office, covering all furniture and upholstery, carried out in three stages for optimal results:Thorough Cleaning of all furniture and rooms to remove dust, stains, and stubborn dirt.Complete Disinfection to ensure a healthy and safe environment for all residents or users.Full Deodorizing leaving the space fresh and pleasantly scented.This service can be applied to a single room, a living area, or the entire home according to your needs.
- [Surface cleaning service](https://rs.com.sa/surface-cleaning-service/): Surface cleaning is a quick cleaning that focuses on removing visible dirt and dust from the surface only, without going deep into fabrics or hidden areas. It is usually used for daily cleaning or when you need a fast clean look without deep treatment.
- [Post-renovation Cleaning](https://rs.com.sa/post-renovation-cleaning/): Post-renovation Cleaning (Unfurnished)Perfect after finishing renovation or construction, or before moving in.We provide a thorough cleaning with three professional steps:
- [Pest control](https://rs.com.sa/pest-control/): Pest control is the process of preventing and eliminating insects inside homes or buildings. It includes removing eggs and adult pests, using safe and effective methods such as safe pesticides or traps. The goal is to maintain a clean and healthy environment and reduce damage to furniture and health.
- [AC- Cleaning](https://rs.com.sa/ac-cleaning/): Air conditioner cleaning is the process of removing dust and dirt from the filters, fan, and internal coils of the unit to ensure the AC works efficiently and improves indoor air quality. Regular cleaning helps reduce electricity consumption and prolong the AC&#8217;s lifespan.

Ensuring the site is completely free of any other workers from the start of the team&#8217;s work until the site is handed over. Ensuring the site is completely free of any construction waste, such as (blocks, cement, sand, paint cans, etc.) before the team arrives. The service does not include the transportation of this waste off-site. If the customer requests tank cleaning, the customer is obligated to empty at least 75% of it before the team [&hellip;]
